_88schema.description: Identifies the version of the JSON schema standard that applies to the metadata.

___name.description: Schema identifier, i.e. the name of the schema standard.

___version.description: Specific version number of the schema standard.

___dataDictionary.description: A description of the contents, format and structure of the physical objects in a data resource.

$eref.description: A catalogue containing definitions and descriptions of the resource types, resource attributes, and resource associations.

___dictionaryFunctionalLanguage.description: Formal functional language used in the dictionary.

___entity.description: Defines the structure of a discrete data object within the data resource.  The data object may be a table, dataset, or single sheet of a spreadsheet.

___responsibleParty.description: Name, address, country, and telecommunications address of person or organization having primary responsibility for the intellectual content of this dictionary.

___description.description: A free text description of the contents of the data dictionary.

___recommendedUse.description: Description of kind(s) of use to which this dictionary may be put.

___locale.description: Defines the language and country of origin in which the data dictionary is written.  E.g. 'eng; USA', 'eng; UK', 'esp; MEX'.

___dictionaryIncludedWithResource.description: Indication of whether or not the data dictionary is included with the resource.

___domain.description: A list of permissable values used to constrain an attribute's value.  A single domain may be assigned to multiple attributes in a table or database.

___subject.description: Identifies the scope of the data dictionary. E.g. 'database', 'dataset', 'table'.

$eref.description: Identifies the version of the JSON schema standard that applies to the metadata.

___name.description: Schema identifier, i.e. the name of the schema standard.

___version.description: Specific version number of the schema standard.

___metadataRepository.description: Identifies repositories for distribution of the resource metadata.

___repository.description: Identifier for the metadata repository to which the metadata record is to be pushed.

___metadataStandard.description: Indicates in what format the metadata record should be delivered to the repository.

___contact.description: An array of contacts to be referenced throughout the metadata. Any contact used in the metadata record must be stored within this array and referenced by contactId. Items in array may be used 0-n times throughout the record.

oneOf.title: name or positionName is required for individual

_88address.description: Physical and email address at which the organization or individual may be contacted.

___addressType.description: The type of address, usually mailing and/or physical.

___phoneNumber.description: Telephone number. Recommended format is to use 'x' or 'ext' to denote extensions.

___phoneName.description: Descriptive name of the phone number.

___service.description: Type(s) of phone number, e.g. voice, sms.

___onlineResource.description: Information about accessing on-line resources and services. This may be a website, profile page, GitHub page, etc. related to the contact.

___contactInstructions.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organization.

___memberOfOrganization.description: Organizations that this contact is related to.

___positionName.description: Role or position of the person, usually within a given organization.

___phone.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organization.

$eref.description: The main body of the metadata record.

___associatedResource.description: Other resources which are directly related to the subject resource such as parent, child, or sibling datasets or projects.

___additionalDocumentation.description: Other documents related to, but not defining, the resource such as factsheets, data catalog pages, award documents, proposals, and informational websites.

___funding.description: Information about funding for the resource.

___resourceLineage.description: Information on the history of the resource.

___resourceDistribution.description: Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource.
